Mouser II

by Tony Young

Released Feb 12, 2012
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM (sha-1: db9a556abf7467602781f0dd4efe5be8fe591cce)

Play now

Description

You play as a mouse who must run around and collect the pieces of cheese. Be careful not to run into any objects!
